author: kevaundray
content:
I think it makes sense to make it completely opaque, so the zkVM SDK has an if statement to check if the output is 32 bytes, instead of having the guest always do the public input compression

<@381789485777682434> I think this mitigates your concerns since its not on the VM level (but in the provided SDK).

If its in the guest program, then we will need a "wrapper" verify function that does the hashing. If its in the SDK, then the "wrapper" would be the default verify function
